localizedText.PopupAdvancedToggleSwitchTooltip_EditUse: Show advanced user groups (e.g. __SystemAdministrators) in the group selection.
localizedText.PopupAdvancedToggleSwitchTooltip_AddUser: Show advanced user groups (e.g. __SystemAdministrators) in the group selection.
localizedText.PopupAdvancedToggleSwitchTooltip_DeleteU: Show advanced users (e.g. __SystemAdministrator) in the user selection combobox.
localizedText.PopupAdvancedToggleSwitchTooltip_ChangeU: Show advanced users (e.g. __SystemAdministrator) in the user selection combobox and advanced user groups (e.g. __SystemAdministrators) in the group selection.
localizedText.PopupAdvancedToggleSwitchTooltip_SwitchU: Show advanced users (e.g. __SystemAdministrator) in the user selection combobox.
